description: This file provides the implementation for creating a Slap Loam Server object, including a function 'SlapCreateLoamServer' that calls an internal constructor 'SlapLsoCreate'. The file includes licensing information, descriptive comments, and the implementation of the server creation function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateLoamServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Slap Loam Server object by invoking the internal constructor 'SlapLsoCreate' with provided context handles.
